thoughts.text: The 'browse_website' command did not provide any useful information about the file I'm looking for. I'm going to try the 'get_hyperlinks' command to retrieve hyperlinks from the webpage and see if any of them are related to the file I'm looking for. If I find a relevant link, I can use the 'execute_shell' command to move the file to the correct directory. Once I move the file, I can use the 'execute_python_file' command to run the code.
